question: Which of the following was the author of Alhakhand?
explanation:
Chand Bardoi was the author of Prithviraj Raso whereas Jagnayak wrote AlhakhandÂ  where he described the chivalrous
deeds of Alha and Udal. Amir Khusrau and Baba Gorakhnath, apart from others are also famous writers of the Sultanate period.
